experience.title: Data Science Intern
experience.description: Project: To predict the Pre-auth amount for cashless claims with auto adjudication•Performed Exploratory Data Analysis to find the factors influencing the amount paid and claim approval•Developed multiple Python models for predicting the amount paid and compared them to choose the best•Combined various models to minimize the root mean squared error and achieve an adjusted r2 value of 0.9499

experience.description: Winter Project | University of Pune | Bhaskaracharya Pratishthana | Prof. S. A. Katre • Studied Abstract Algebra, particularly Group Theory for over a period of one month under Prof. S A Katre at Pune University• Studied topics like Normal Subgroups, Cayley Theorem, Permutation Groups, Sylow Theorems and Finite Abelian Groups• Read the basics of Rings, Fields and got introduced to the basics of Algebraic Number Theory
